name: Juliana

skills.name: Battledance
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Each critical hit fills this Champion's Turn Meter by 10%.

effects.notes: Each critical hit fills TM by 10%. At 100% C.RATE, 2 hits = 20% TM boost.

skills.book_value: Low: +15% damage total. Not priority vs A2/A3.
skills.notes: Multi-hit A1 synergizes with Giant Slayer (2 hits = ~51% proc). TM boost requires 100% C.RATE. Good for turn cycling.

skills.name: Lethal Partner
skills.description: Places a 30% [Increase C.RATE] buff on this Champion, then attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Places a 5% [Poison] debuff on the target for 3 turns if this attack is critical.

effects.notes: Places 30% Inc C.RATE on self BEFORE attacking. Enables Poison without external C.RATE buffs.
Each critical hit places ONE 5% Poison for 3 turns. At 100% C.RATE, 2 hits = TWO Poisons.

skills.book_value: Medium: +20% damage. A3 higher priority for books.
skills.notes: Core Clan Boss Poison skill. Self-buffs C.RATE before attacking = more reliable Poison. At 100% C.RATE, places TWO 5% Poisons per use. Multi-hit synergizes with Giant Slayer.

skills.name: Fire of Purgation
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Removes all buffs from the target. Has a 75% chance of placing a [HP Burn] debuff for 3 turns.

effects.notes: Removes ALL buffs from target before damage. Useful for Arena/dungeons.
75% base (100% booked) chance to place HP Burn for 3 turns.

skills.book_value: CRITICAL: +20% damage, +25% HP Burn chance (75%→100%). Essential for reliable HP Burn.
skills.notes: Buff strip + HP Burn. Must book for 100% HP Burn chance. Huge damage multiplier (6.0x). Primary Clan Boss HP Burn source.

skills.name: Resonance (Passive)
skills.description: Has a 50% chance of placing a 5% [Poison] debuff for 2 turns when hitting an enemy under a [HP Burn] debuff.

effects.notes: 50% chance per hit to place 5% Poison when hitting enemy with HP Burn. Synergizes with A3 HP Burn and multi-hit A1/A2.

skills.notes: AMAZING Clan Boss passive. A3 places HP Burn, then A1/A2 multi-hits trigger passive for extra Poisons. At 100% C.RATE with HP Burn up: A1 (2 hits) + A2 (2 hits) can place up to 4 extra Poisons per rotation via passive + A2 crits.

forms.aura: Increases Ally SPD in Dungeons by 19%
forms.comments: Elite Clan Boss Epic champion. Poison specialist with HP Burn. Passive enables massive Poison stacking when HP Burn is active. Must build 100% C.RATE for maximum Poison output. Fully book A3 for 100% HP Burn reliability.

stat_priority_recommendations.clan_boss: PRIORITY: 100% C.RATE (CRITICAL for Poison on A2 + passive procs), 250+ ACC (reliable debuffs), 220+ SPD (speed tuning), 70%+ C.DMG, 2500+ DEF (survivability). Lifesteal set mandatory.
stat_priority_recommendations.dungeons: 220+ SPD, 200+ ACC, 100% C.RATE, DEF%/HP% for survivability. Savage or Cruel sets.
stat_priority_recommendations.arena: Low priority. If used: 250+ SPD, 100% C.RATE, C.DMG focus.

clan_boss: OFFENSE: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Single Out, Bring it Down, Methodical, GIANT SLAYER (CRITICAL - A1 'Battledance' attacks 2 times, A2 'Lethal Partner' attacks 2 times, 30% proc per hit). Multi-hit champion = Giant Slayer optimal.
DEFENSE: Tough Skin, Blastproof, Resurgent, Delay Death, Retribution (if Lifesteal), Deterrence

SUPPORT: Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, SWARM SMITER (CRITICAL - multi-hit A1/A2 synergy), Evil Eye, EAGLE EYE (CRITICAL - +50 ACC for 250+ total), Lore of Steel, MASTER HEXER (CRITICAL - extends Poison/HP Burn from 2→3 or 3→4 turns), Cycle of Magic (reduces A2/A3 cooldowns)
dungeons: OFFENSE: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Single Out, Bring it Down, GIANT SLAYER (CRITICAL - A1/A2 multi-hit)
DEFENSE: Tough Skin, Blastproof, Resurgent, Delay Death
SUPPORT: Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, SWARM SMITER (CRITICAL - multi-hit synergy), Evil Eye, EAGLE EYE (CRITICAL - +50 ACC), Lore of Steel, Master Hexer, Cycle of Violence
arena: OFFENSE: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Single Out, HELMSMASHER (Ignore DEF burst) OR Giant Slayer
SUPPORT: Charged Focus, Lore of Steel, Cycle of Violence
doom_tower: OFFENSE: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Single Out, Bring it Down, GIANT SLAYER (CRITICAL - A1/A2 multi-hit)
DEFENSE: Tough Skin, Blastproof, Resurgent, Delay Death
SUPPORT: Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, SWARM SMITER (CRITICAL), Evil Eye, EAGLE EYE (CRITICAL), Lore of Steel, Master Hexer
faction_wars: OFFENSE: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Single Out, Bring it Down, GIANT SLAYER (CRITICAL - A1/A2 multi-hit)
DEFENSE: Tough Skin, Blastproof, Resurgent, Delay Death
SUPPORT: Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, SWARM SMITER (CRITICAL), Evil Eye, EAGLE EYE (CRITICAL), Lore of Steel, Master Hexer
masteries.general: Giant Slayer CRITICAL (A1 attacks 2 times, A2 attacks 2 times = multi-hit, 30% proc per hit). Master Hexer CRITICAL (extends Poison/HP Burn debuffs for massive damage). Eagle Eye CRITICAL (+50 ACC for 250+ total). Swarm Smiter CRITICAL (multi-hit A1/A2 synergy). 100% C.RATE non-negotiable for Poison reliability (A2 places Poison on crit, passive triggers on HP Burn hits). Must book A3 for 100% HP Burn chance.

blessings: Brimstone (Clan Boss/Hydra - HP Burn synergy with passive)

ai_quirks.ai_issue_description: Good AI. Will use A2/A3 when available. No major issues.

cheese_strategy.cheese_mechanic_info: Not a cheese champion. Pure Poison/HP Burn specialist for Clan Boss.

mechanics_advisory: TOP-TIER Clan Boss Epic champion. Elite Poison specialist with HP Burn. UNIQUE PASSIVE: Places extra 5% Poisons when hitting enemies under HP Burn (50% chance per hit). Combo: A3 places HP Burn → A1/A2 multi-hits trigger passive for extra Poisons → A2 crit hits place more Poisons = MASSIVE Poison stacking. REQUIRES 100% C.RATE for maximum output (A2 places Poison on crit, passive needs hits). MUST BOOK A3 for 100% HP Burn reliability. Lifesteal set mandatory. Master Hexer extends debuffs for more damage. User Priority: Clan Boss UNM (Priority 1) - Juliana is MUST-BUILD for UNM Poison teams. Self-sufficient with Inc C.RATE buff on A2. Dungeon aura (+19% SPD) is bonus. Sacred Order Faction Wars viable (7/10).
author: GitHub Copilot
comments: Clan Boss UNM Poison specialist. Passive is AMAZING for Poison stacking when HP Burn is active. Must have 100% C.RATE. Must book A3 for 100% HP Burn. Giant Slayer + Master Hexer + Eagle Eye non-negotiable.

update_notes.last_patch: Completed from DRAFT with full effects, masteries, and meta analysis. Validated against Ayumilove/HellHades/RaidWiki.

validation_metadata.ocr_notes: Stats from RaidWiki + Ayumilove OCR validation (100% match on HP/ATK/DEF/SPD)
